channel.title: Contemplation
channel.itunes:author: Swami Guruparananda
channel.itunes:subtitle: Vedanta talks in Tamil
channel.itunes:summary:
After the study of Vedanta, one must practice contemplation meditation (Nidhidhyasanam) to absorb the knowledge. This talk inquires into the nature of this type of meditation.
The entire collection of Swamiji's talks is available at the Poornalayam website.
